title: SimdConstPtr in std::simd::prelude - Rust
markdown:
# SimdConstPtr in std::simd::prelude - Rust

```
pub trait SimdConstPtr: Copy + Sealed {
    type Usize;
    type Isize;
    type CastPtr<T>;
    type MutPtr;
    type Mask;

    // Required methods
    fn is_null(self) -> Self::Mask;
    fn cast<T>(self) -> Self::CastPtr<T>;
    fn cast_mut(self) -> Self::MutPtr;
    fn addr(self) -> Self::Usize;
    fn with_addr(self, addr: Self::Usize) -> Self;
    fn expose_provenance(self) -> Self::Usize;
    fn with_exposed_provenance(addr: Self::Usize) -> Self;
    fn wrapping_offset(self, offset: Self::Isize) -> Self;
    fn wrapping_add(self, count: Self::Usize) -> Self;
    fn wrapping_sub(self, count: Self::Usize) -> Self;
}
```

[source](https://doc.rust-lang.org/1.80.0/src/core/portable-simd/crates/core_simd/src/simd/ptr/const_ptr.rs.html#27)

ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (`portable_simd`Â [#86656](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/86656))

Casts to a pointer of another type.

Equivalent to calling [`pointer::cast`](about:blank/primitive.pointer.html#method.cast "method pointer::cast") on each element.

[source](https://doc.rust-lang.org/1.80.0/src/core/portable-simd/crates/core_simd/src/simd/ptr/const_ptr.rs.html#32)

ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (`portable_simd`Â [#86656](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/86656))

Changes constness without changing the type.

Equivalent to calling [`pointer::cast_mut`](about:blank/primitive.pointer.html#method.cast_mut "method pointer::cast_mut") on each element.

[source](https://doc.rust-lang.org/1.80.0/src/core/portable-simd/crates/core_simd/src/simd/ptr/const_ptr.rs.html#43)

ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (`portable_simd`Â [#86656](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/86656))

Gets the â€œaddressâ€ portion of the pointer.

This method discards pointer semantic metadata, so the result cannot be directly cast into a valid pointer.

This method semantically discards _provenance_ and _address-space_ information. To properly restore that information, use [`Self::with_addr`](about:blank/trait.SimdConstPtr.html#tymethod.with_addr "method core::core_simd::simd::ptr::const_ptr::SimdConstPtr::with_addr::with_addr").

Equivalent to calling [`pointer::addr`](about:blank/primitive.pointer.html#method.addr "method pointer::addr") on each element.

[source](https://doc.rust-lang.org/1.80.0/src/core/portable-simd/crates/core_simd/src/simd/ptr/const_ptr.rs.html#51)

ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (`portable_simd`Â [#86656](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/86656))

Creates a new pointer with the given address.

This performs the same operation as a cast, but copies the _address-space_ and _provenance_ of `self` to the new pointer.

Equivalent to calling [`pointer::with_addr`](about:blank/primitive.pointer.html#method.with_addr "method pointer::with_addr") on each element.

[source](https://doc.rust-lang.org/1.80.0/src/core/portable-simd/crates/core_simd/src/simd/ptr/const_ptr.rs.html#55)

ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (`portable_simd`Â [#86656](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/86656))

Exposes the â€œprovenanceâ€ part of the pointer for future use in [`Self::with_exposed_provenance`](about:blank/trait.SimdConstPtr.html#tymethod.with_exposed_provenance "associated function core::core_simd::simd::ptr::const_ptr::SimdConstPtr::with_exposed_provenance::with_exposed_provenance") and returns the â€œaddressâ€ portion.

[source](https://doc.rust-lang.org/1.80.0/src/core/portable-simd/crates/core_simd/src/simd/ptr/const_ptr.rs.html#60)

ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (`portable_simd`Â [#86656](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/86656))

[source](https://doc.rust-lang.org/1.80.0/src/core/portable-simd/crates/core_simd/src/simd/ptr/const_ptr.rs.html#65)

ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (`portable_simd`Â [#86656](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/86656))

Calculates the offset from a pointer using wrapping arithmetic.

Equivalent to calling [`pointer::wrapping_offset`](about:blank/primitive.pointer.html#method.wrapping_offset "method pointer::wrapping_offset") on each element.

[source](https://doc.rust-lang.org/1.80.0/src/core/portable-simd/crates/core_simd/src/simd/ptr/const_ptr.rs.html#70)

ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (`portable_simd`Â [#86656](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/86656))

Calculates the offset from a pointer using wrapping arithmetic.

Equivalent to calling [`pointer::wrapping_add`](about:blank/primitive.pointer.html#method.wrapping_add "method pointer::wrapping_add") on each element.

[source](https://doc.rust-lang.org/1.80.0/src/core/portable-simd/crates/core_simd/src/simd/ptr/const_ptr.rs.html#75)

ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (`portable_simd`Â [#86656](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/86656))

Calculates the offset from a pointer using wrapping arithmetic.

Equivalent to calling [`pointer::wrapping_sub`](about:blank/primitive.pointer.html#method.wrapping_sub "method pointer::wrapping_sub") on each element.

source Â· 
pub trait SimdConstPtr: Copy + Sealed {
    type Usize;
    type Isize;
    type CastPtr<T>;
    type MutPtr;
    type Mask;

    // Required methods
    fn is_null(self) -> Self::Mask;
    fn cast<T>(self) -> Self::CastPtr<T>;
    fn cast_mut(self) -> Self::MutPtr;
    fn addr(self) -> Self::Usize;
    fn with_addr(self, addr: Self::Usize) -> Self;
    fn expose_provenance(self) -> Self::Usize;
    fn with_exposed_provenance(addr: Self::Usize) -> Self;
    fn wrapping_offset(self, offset: Self::Isize) -> Self;
    fn wrapping_add(self, count: Self::Usize) -> Self;
    fn wrapping_sub(self, count: Self::Usize) -> Self;
}
ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (portable_simd #86656)
Expand description

Operations on SIMD vectors of constant pointers.

Required Associated TypesÂ§

source

type Usize

ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (portable_simd #86656)

Vector of usize with the same number of elements.

source

Vector of isize with the same number of elements.

source

type CastPtr<T>

ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (portable_simd #86656)

Vector of const pointers with the same number of elements.

source

type MutPtr

ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (portable_simd #86656)

Vector of mutable pointers to the same type.

source

type Mask

ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (portable_simd #86656)

Mask type used for manipulating this SIMD vector type.

Required MethodsÂ§

source

fn is_null(self) -> Self::Mask

ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (portable_simd #86656)

Returns true for each element that is null.

source

fn cast<T>(self) -> Self::CastPtr<T>

ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (portable_simd #86656)

Casts to a pointer of another type.

Equivalent to calling pointer::cast on each element.

source

fn cast_mut(self) -> Self::MutPtr

ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (portable_simd #86656)

Changes constness without changing the type.

Equivalent to calling pointer::cast_mut on each element.

source

fn addr(self) -> Self::Usize

ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (portable_simd #86656)

Gets the â€œaddressâ€ portion of the pointer.

This method discards pointer semantic metadata, so the result cannot be directly cast into a valid pointer.

This method semantically discards provenance and address-space information. To properly restore that information, use Self::with_addr.

Equivalent to calling pointer::addr on each element.

source

fn with_addr(self, addr: Self::Usize) -> Self

ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (portable_simd #86656)

Creates a new pointer with the given address.

This performs the same operation as a cast, but copies the address-space and provenance of self to the new pointer.

Equivalent to calling pointer::with_addr on each element.

source

fn expose_provenance(self) -> Self::Usize

ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (portable_simd #86656)

Exposes the â€œprovenanceâ€ part of the pointer for future use in Self::with_exposed_provenance and returns the â€œaddressâ€ portion.

source

fn with_exposed_provenance(addr: Self::Usize) -> Self

ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (portable_simd #86656)

Convert an address back to a pointer, picking up a previously â€œexposedâ€ provenance.

Equivalent to calling core::ptr::with_exposed_provenance on each element.

source

fn wrapping_offset(self, offset: Self::Isize) -> Self

ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (portable_simd #86656)

Calculates the offset from a pointer using wrapping arithmetic.

Equivalent to calling pointer::wrapping_offset on each element.

source

fn wrapping_add(self, count: Self::Usize) -> Self

ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (portable_simd #86656)

Calculates the offset from a pointer using wrapping arithmetic.

Equivalent to calling pointer::wrapping_add on each element.

source

fn wrapping_sub(self, count: Self::Usize) -> Self

ğŸ”¬This is a nightly-only experimental API. (portable_simd #86656)

Calculates the offset from a pointer using wrapping arithmetic.

Equivalent to calling pointer::wrapping_sub on each element.

Object SafetyÂ§

This trait is not object safe.

ImplementorsÂ§

sourceÂ§

impl<T, const N: usize> SimdConstPtr for Simd<*const T, N>
where LaneCount<N>: SupportedLaneCount,

Â§

type Usize = Simd<usize, N>

Â§

type Isize = Simd<isize, N>

Â§

type CastPtr<U> = Simd<*const U, N>

Â§

type MutPtr = Simd<*mut T, N>

Â§

type Mask = Mask<isize, N>
